'''Marana's Avatar''' is a quest-exclusive boss encountered during the ''[[For All Children Who Long for Life]]'' World Quest.

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats
|resglobal  = 0%

|hp_ratio     = 3
|atk_ratio    = 8

|hide_notes = 1
}}

==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1 = Withering Shockwaves
|desc_1 = Repeatedly releases large waves around itself covering the entire arena, dealing '''10% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DoT}}. During this attack, [[Arama]] will lead the player to a [[The Withering|Tumor of the Withering]]. When the Tumor of the Withering is destroyed, this attack will end and the Marana's Avatar will become paralyzed.
|name_2 = Falling Death
|desc_2 = Summons waves of 3 bubbles that mark an area on the ground before striking down, dealing '''30% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
|name_3 = Withering Light
|desc_3 = Summons multiple lasers that strike the ground, rapidly dealing '''10% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DoT}} before causing a massive explosion, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. During this attack, Arama will create a barrier that protects the player from it.
|file_3_2 = Marana's Avatar Withering Light 2
|caption_3_2 = Protected
|name_4 = Phase 2
|desc_4 = In the 2nd phase, the Marana's Avatar will repeatedly use '''Falling Death''' while summoning waves of [[Riftwolves]].
}}
